gobblin.metrics.reporter

Class MetricReportReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.ScheduledReporter
      • gobblin.metrics.reporter.RecursiveScheduledReporter
        • gobblin.metrics.reporter.RecursiveScheduledMetricReporter
          • gobblin.metrics.reporter.MetricReportReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Reporter, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KafkaReporter

    public abstract class MetricReportReporter
extends RecursiveScheduledMetricReporter
    Scheduled reporter based on MetricReport.

    This class will generate a metric report, and call emitReport(gobblin.metrics.MetricReport) to actually emit the metrics.

      • report

        public void report(java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,com.codahale.metrics.Gauge> gauges,
                   java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,com.codahale.metrics.Counter> counters,
                   java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,com.codahale.metrics.Histogram> histograms,
                   java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,com.codahale.metrics.Meter> meters,
                   java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.String,com.codahale.metrics.Timer> timers,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> tags)
        Serializes metrics and pushes the byte arrays to Kafka. Uses the serialize* methods in MetricReportReporter.
        Specified by:
        report in class RecursiveScheduledMetricReporter
        Parameters:
        gauges - map of Gauge to report and their name.
        counters - map of Counter to report and their name.
        histograms - map of Histogram to report and their name.
        meters - map of Meter to report and their name.
        timers - map of Timer to report and their name.
